VIP AI 101 CheatSheet for Allhttp://www.montreal.ai/ai4all.pdf A LEGENDARY HISTORY Learn the Source of an Exceptional LegacyBorn in July 1973 in QueÃÅbec City, QueÃÅbec, Canada. A frail kid raised by youth centers and social welfare families (Sept. 8, 1981 ‚Äì June 21, 1991) (photo before), Vincent Boucher has done his first grade twice as well as his seventh grade. Until age 14, he faced a nightmare. In May 1988, he found in a recycling bin a book quoting William James. At this moment, he decided to change his life. ¬´To change one‚Äôs life: Start immediately. Do it flamboyantly. No exceptions.¬ª. ‚Äì William James In 1993, Vincent Boucher took only 29 minutes to win, with the first 100 % score ever, the Ordre des chimiste du QueÃÅbec competition. In 1996, he completed a B. Sc. Theoretical Physics in 1 year (suite de l‚Äôarticle), followed by a Master‚Äôs degree in Government Policy Analysis (1998) and a Master‚Äôs degree in Aerospace Engineering (2000). From 2000 to 2002, he provided management consulting for the Canadian Space Agency.
